mapper.sql: zid, uid, api_code, api_name, method, status, description,is_deleted, creator, DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_time, updator, DATE_FORMAT(update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS update_time
mapper.insert:
insert into wc_openapi
uid, api_code, api_name, method,
status,
description,
creator, create_time, updator, update_time,
#{uid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{apiCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
#{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STR_TO_DATE(#{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STR_TO_DATE(#{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
mapper.update:
update wc_openapi
api_name = #{apiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
method = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updator = #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = STR_TO_DATE(#{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
where api_code = #{apiCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM webcore.wc_openapi
is_deleted=0
AND api_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{apiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND method = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
